mapper.select: select a.created_at as date, sum(b.total_price) as sales, count(b.id) as salesCnt, a.memcnt as signinCnt from (select count(DATE(mem.created_at)) as memcnt, DATE(mem.created_at) as d, mem.created_at as created_at from members as mem where DATE(mem.created_at) = #{day}) as a, orders b where DATE(b.ordered_at) = a.d;

select c.id as id, c.provider_id as providerId, c.age_range as ageRange, c.nickname as nickname, c.gender as gender, d.purchasesCount as purchasesCount, d.totalPurchase as totalPurchase, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from members as c LEFT JOIN (select a.id as id, count(*) as purchasesCount, sum(b.total_price) as totalPurchase from members a, orders b where a.id = b.member_id group by a.id) as d on c.id = d.id
where c.nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select c.id as productId, c.thumbnail_url as imgUrl, c.name as productName, c.stock as stock, d.salesCount as salesCount, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from products as c LEFT JOIN (select sum(b.quantity) as salesCount, a.id as product_id from products a, order_product b where a.id = b.product_id group by a.id) as d on c.id = d.product_id where c.status = 1
and c.name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')

select c.id as id, c.order_id as orderId, c.member_id as memberId, c.product_id as productId, d.name as productName, d.thumbnail_url as productThumbnailUrl, c.quantity as quantity, c.unit_price as unitPrice, c.ordered_at as orderedAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from order_product as c LEFT JOIN( select id, name, thumbnail_url from products) as d on c.product_id = d.id where order_id = #{orderId};

select c.id as id, c.member_id as memberId, c.total_price as totalPrice, d.productCount as productCount, c.ordered_at as orderedAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from orders as c LEFT JOIN ( select a.id as id, count(*) as productCount from orders a, order_product b where a.id = b.order_id group by a.id) as d on c.id = d.id
where c.id = #{keyWord};
